attribution: הספרייה הלאומית, מארכיון דן הדני. יוצר/ים: [יש לציין את שם היוצר/ים]. אם שם היוצר/ים אינו ידוע יש לציין: יוצר/ים: צוות יפפא The National Library of Israel, from Dan Hadani's Archive. Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: One of several rounds of Katyusha rocket attacks on the Galilee killed two people and wounded ten others in the northern town of Kyriat Shmona last night, The attacks by the Hizbulla terrorists follow one of the most concentrated and heavy bombardment in recent years by the Israel Air Force against terrorist targets in the Bekaa Valley, as well as villages north of the security zone, Many important terrorist target were reported destroyed including terrorist bases and a Hizbulla television station in Ba'albek.
